document.full_text: dupont faces a tough task to convince shareholders of danish group danisco to accept its $6.4 billion offer, even after it cleared another hurdle by gaining european union approval for the deal.
document.title: doubts linger as eu clears dupont's danisco buy
lines_and_colors: dupont faces a tough task to convince shareholders of danish group danisco to accept its $6.4 billion offer, even after it cleared another hurdle by gaining european union approval for the deal.
